1649.title: The service can delete specific content without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice
tosdr.tldr: Jagex may at any time and at their sole discretion delete virtual items and currencies bought with real money.

8030.quoteText: If you disallow Cookies, your use of our website, products or services may be impaired.
8030.title: Blocking cookies may limit your ability to use the service

tosdr.case: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

8050.quoteText: We encourage you to review the privacy and cookies polices of the third parties we work with for more information about cookies they set and how to manage them.
8050.title: The service refers users to external documents for more information

tosdr.case: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

8052.quoteText: This website is not intended for children under 13 years old and we do not knowingly collect data relating to children under 13 years old.
8052.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

8054.quoteText: Aggregated Data may be derived from your personal data but is not considered personal data in law as this data does not directly or indirectly reveal your identity.
8054.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

tosdr.case: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

8063.quoteText: We will only use your personal data for the purposes for which we collected it, unless we reasonably consider that we need to use it for another reason and that reason is compatible with the original purpose.
8063.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

8065.quoteText: Jagex reserves the right to stop offering a Jagex Product or a particular part of a Jagex Product at any time either permanently or temporarily, at which point any license granted to you to use the Jagex Product or a part thereof will be automatically terminated or suspended
8065.title: They may stop providing the service at any time

tosdr.case: They may stop providing the service at any time

8072.quoteText: You have the ability to remove User Content which you have posted on a Jagex Product forum
8072.title: You can delete your content from this service

tosdr.case: You can delete your content from this service

8074.quoteText: You agree to waive any moral rights to the extent permitted by law and that you will not withdraw the submission or attempt to make a charge for its use.
8074.title: You sign away moral rights
